key.name: enable-active-window
key.summary: When enabled, the top panel will only hide if the active window takes the space.

key.name: show-in-overview
key.summary: When enabled, the panel will be visible in overview.

key.name: hot-corner
key.summary: When enabled, keeps the hot corner sensitive when panel is in hidden.

key.name: mouse-sensitive
key.summary: When enabled, show the top panel not only in overview but also when the mouse approaches the edge of the screen.

key.name: mouse-sensitive-fullscreen-window
key.summary: When enabled, show the top panel not only in overview but also when the mouse approaches the edge of the screen.

key.name: pressure-threshold
key.summary: Number of pixels the mouse has to overrun in order to trigger the pressure barrier.

key.name: pressure-timeout
key.summary: Amount of time in milliseconds before pressure barrier is triggered.

key.name: animation-time-autohide
key.summary: Amount of time it takes to slide the top panel in/out.
